amendment.description: Amendment increases funding for the Rural Domestic Violence and Child Abuse Enforcement Assistance Grants by $10 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to increase appropriations (by transfer) for the Violence Against Women Prevention and Prosecution Programs, and reduce appropriations for the National Science Foundation operations and award management program by $10 million.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Capito amendment (A017) Agreed to by recorded vote: 243 - 186 (Roll no. 727).
